question: What are the most common side effects of amantadine ER?
ideal_answer: The most common side effects of amantadine ER are hallucination, dizziness, orthostatic hypotension and pedal edema.

snippets.text: The most common side effects are hallucination, dizziness, orthostatic hypotension and pedal edema.

exact_answer: Hallucination, Dissiness, Orthostatic hypotension, Pedal edema
